1→# Tasks: Phase 14B - Numeric Type Predicates Enhancement
     2→
     3→**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-numeric-predicates/`
     4→**Prerequisites**: plan.md (required), spec.md (required), research.md, data-model.md, quickstart.md
     5→**Branch**: `001-numeric-predicates`
     6→
     7→**Scope Note**: User Stories 1 & 2 (sign/parity predicates) are **already implemented** in `func-section.lisp:4414-4603`. This task list covers only the remaining 10 functions from User Stories 3, 4, and 5.
     8→
     9→**Tests**: TDD required per Constitution VII. Tests written first, must fail before implementation.
    10→
    11→## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`
    12→
    13→- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
    14→- **[Story]**: Which user story (US3, US4, US5) - maps to spec.md
    15→
    16→---
    17→
    18→## Phase 1: Setup
    19→
    20→**Purpose**: Verify development environment and existing dependencies
    21→
    22→- [x] T001 Verify nix develop environment loads with SBCL 2.4+ and wasm-tools
    23→- [x] T002 Verify existing bit operations (ash, logand, logior, logxor) compile correctly
    24→
    25→**Checkpoint**: Development environment ready
    26→
    27→---
    28→
    29→## Phase 2: Foundational (Shared Test Infrastructure)
    30→
    31→**Purpose**: Create test file structure that all user stories will use
    32→
    33→**⚠️ CRITICAL**: No implementation can begin until test infrastructure exists
    34→
    35→- [x] T003 Create test file tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp with rove test package setup
    36→- [x] T004 [P] Create test file tests/contract/byte-ops-wasm-test.lisp for Wasm output validation
    37→- [x] T005 [P] Create helper function `compile-and-validate` in test utils for Wasm validation
    38→
    39→**Checkpoint**: Test infrastructure ready - TDD can now proceed
    40→
    41→---
    42→
    43→## Phase 3: User Story 3 - Bit Testing Functions (Priority: P2)
    44→
    45→**Goal**: Implement [logbitp](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_logbtp.htm) and [logtest](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_logtes.htm) for testing individual bits
    46→
    47→**Independent Test**: Compile `(logbitp 0 5)` and verify it returns T; compile `(logtest 4 3)` and verify it returns NIL
    48→
    49→### Tests for User Story 3 (TDD - write first, must fail)
    50→
    51→- [x] T006 [P] [US3] Write unit test for logbitp in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
    52→- [x] T007 [P] [US3] Write unit test for logtest in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
    53→- [x] T008 [US3] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)
    54→
    55→### Implementation for User Story 3
    56→
    57→- [x] T009 [US3] Add `logbitp` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
    58→- [x] T010 [US3] Implement `compile-logbitp` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
    59→- [x] T011 [US3] Add `logtest` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
    60→- [x] T012 [US3] Implement `compile-logtest` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
    61→- [x] T013 [US3] Run tests and verify they PASS
    62→- [x] T014 [US3] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`
    63→
    64→**Checkpoint**: Bit testing functions complete and independently testable
    65→
    66→---
    67→
    68→## Phase 4: User Story 4 - Byte Specifier Functions (Priority: P2)
    69→
    70→**Goal**: Implement [byte](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm), [byte-size](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm), [byte-position](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm) using fixnum encoding
    71→
    72→**Independent Test**: Compile `(byte-size (byte 8 4))` and verify it returns 8; compile `(byte-position (byte 8 4))` and verify it returns 4
    73→
    74→### Tests for User Story 4 (TDD - write first, must fail)
    75→
    76→- [x] T015 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte constructor in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
    77→- [x] T016 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte-size in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
    78→- [x] T017 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte-position in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
    79→- [x] T018 [US4] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)
    80→
    81→### Implementation for User Story 4
    82→
    83→- [x] T019 [US4] Add `byte` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
    84→- [x] T020 [US4] Implement `compile-byte` using encoding `(size << 6) | position` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
    85→- [x] T021 [P] [US4] Add `byte-size` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
    86→- [x] T022 [P] [US4] Implement `compile-byte-size` using `spec >> 6` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
    87→- [x] T023 [P] [US4] Add `byte-position` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
    88→- [x] T024 [P] [US4] Implement `compile-byte-position` using `spec & 63` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
    89→- [x] T025 [US4] Run tests and verify they PASS
    90→- [x] T026 [US4] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`
    91→
    92→**Checkpoint**: Byte specifier functions complete and independently testable
    93→
    94→---
    95→
    96→## Phase 5: User Story 5 - Byte Extraction and Manipulation (Priority: P3)
    97→
    98→**Goal**: Implement [ldb](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_ldb.htm), [dpb](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_dpb.htm), [mask-field](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_mask_f.htm), [deposit-field](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_deposi.htm)
    99→
   100→**Depends on**: User Story 4 (byte specifier functions)
   101→
   102→**Independent Test**: Compile `(ldb (byte 4 4) #xAB)` and verify it returns #xA; compile `(dpb #xC (byte 4 4) #xAB)` and verify it returns #xCB
   103→
   104→### Tests for User Story 5 (TDD - write first, must fail)
   105→
   106→- [x] T027 [P] [US5] Write unit test for ldb in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
   107→- [x] T028 [P] [US5] Write unit test for dpb in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
   108→- [x] T029 [P] [US5] Write unit test for mask-field in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
   109→- [x] T030 [P] [US5] Write unit test for deposit-field in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
   110→- [x] T031 [US5] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)
   111→
   112→### Implementation for User Story 5
   113→
   114→- [x] T032 [US5] Add `ldb` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
   115→- [x] T033 [US5] Implement `compile-ldb` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer >> position) & mask`)
   116→- [x] T034 [US5] Add `mask-field` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
   117→- [x] T035 [US5] Implement `compile-mask-field` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `integer & field-mask`)
   118→- [x] T036 [US5] Add `dpb` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
   119→- [x] T037 [US5] Implement `compile-dpb` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer & ~mask) | ((newbyte << pos) & mask)`)
   120→- [x] T038 [US5] Add `deposit-field` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
   121→- [x] T039 [US5] Implement `compile-deposit-field` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer & ~mask) | (newbyte & mask)`)
   122→- [x] T040 [US5] Run tests and verify they PASS
   123→- [x] T041 [US5] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`
   124→
   125→**Checkpoint**: All byte operations complete and independently testable
   126→
   127→---
   128→
   129→## Phase 6: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
   130→
   131→**Purpose**: Registration, documentation, and final validation
   132→
   133→- [x] T042 [P] Update feature-registry.lisp with entries for all 10 functions in src/clysm/validation/feature-registry.lisp
   134→- [x] T043 [P] Add HyperSpec links as comments in each compile-* function
   135→- [ ] T044 [P] Create integration test in tests/integration/byte-ops-run-test.lisp
   136→- [ ] T045 Run full test suite: `sbcl --eval "(asdf:test-system :clysm)"`
   137→- [x] T046 Verify quickstart.md checklist is complete
   138→
   139→---
   140→
   141→## Dependencies & Execution Order
   142→
   143→### Phase Dependencies
   144→
   145→```
   146→Phase 1 (Setup) → Phase 2 (Foundational) → Phase 3-5 (User Stories) → Phase 6 (Polish)
   147→```
   148→
   149→### User Story Dependencies
   150→
   151→- **US3 (Bit Testing)**: No dependencies on other stories - can start after Phase 2
   152→- **US4 (Byte Specifiers)**: No dependencies on other stories - can start after Phase 2
   153→- **US5 (Byte Operations)**: Depends on US4 completion (needs byte, byte-size, byte-position)
   154→
   155→```
   156→Phase 2 (Foundational)
   157→    │
   158→    ├──→ US3 (Bit Testing) ──→ Phase 6
   159→    │
   160→    ├──→ US4 (Byte Specifiers) ──→ US5 (Byte Operations) ──→ Phase 6
   161→```
   162→
   163→### Within Each User Story (TDD)
   164→
   165→1. Write tests FIRST (T006-T008, T015-T018, T027-T031)
   166→2. Run tests → MUST FAIL
   167→3. Implement functions (T009-T014, T019-T026, T032-T041)
   168→4. Run tests → MUST PASS
   169→5. Validate Wasm output
   170→
   171→### Parallel Opportunities
   172→
   173→**Phase 2 (can run in parallel)**:
   174→```
   175→T004 (contract test file) || T005 (test helper)
   176→```
   177→
   178→**US3 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
   179→```
   180→T006 (logbitp test) || T007 (logtest test)
   181→```
   182→
   183→**US4 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
   184→```
   185→T015 (byte test) || T016 (byte-size test) || T017 (byte-position test)
   186→```
   187→
   188→**US4 Implementation (can run in parallel after T020)**:
   189→```
   190→T021+T022 (byte-size) || T023+T024 (byte-position)
   191→```
   192→
   193→**US5 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
   194→```
   195→T027 (ldb) || T028 (dpb) || T029 (mask-field) || T030 (deposit-field)
   196→```
   197→
   198→**Phase 6 (can run in parallel)**:
   199→```
   200→T042 (registry) || T043 (comments) || T044 (integration test)
   201→```
   202→
   203→---
   204→
   205→## Parallel Example: User Story 4
   206→
   207→```bash
   208→# Launch all tests in parallel (TDD step 1):
   209→Task: "Write unit test for byte constructor in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"
   210→Task: "Write unit test for byte-size in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"
   211→Task: "Write unit test for byte-position in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"
   212→
   213→# After byte implemented, launch accessors in parallel:
   214→Task: "Implement compile-byte-size using spec >> 6"
   215→Task: "Implement compile-byte-position using spec & 63"
   216→```
   217→
   218→---
   219→
   220→## Implementation Strategy
   221→
   222→### MVP First (User Story 3 + 4 Only)
   223→
   224→1. Complete Phase 1: Setup
   225→2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational
   226→3. Complete Phase 3: US3 (Bit Testing) - `logbitp`, `logtest`
   227→4. Complete Phase 4: US4 (Byte Specifiers) - `byte`, `byte-size`, `byte-position`
   228→5. **STOP and VALIDATE**: 5 functions working independently
   229→6. Can ship MVP with bit testing + byte specifiers
   230→
   231→### Full Delivery
   232→
   233→1. MVP + Phase 5: US5 (Byte Operations)
   234→2. Phase 6: Polish
   235→3. All 10 functions complete
   236→
   237→### Suggested Order
   238→
   239→```
   240→T001 → T002 → T003 → T004 → T005 (Setup + Foundational)
   241→                ↓
   242→    ┌───────────┴───────────┐
   243→    ↓                       ↓
   244→US3 (T006-T014)      US4 (T015-T026)
   245→    │                       │
   246→    │                       ↓
   247→    │               US5 (T027-T041)
   248→    │                       │
   249→    └───────────┬───────────┘
   250→                ↓
   251→        Phase 6 (T042-T046)
   252→```
   253→
   254→---
   255→
   256→## Notes
   257→
   258→- All 10 functions go into single file: `src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp`
   259→- Follow existing patterns from `compile-evenp` (line 4576) and `compile-ash` (line 2837)
   260→- Byte specifier encoding: `(size << 6) | position` - matches SBCL/CCL
   261→- TDD is non-negotiable per Constitution VII
   262→- Commit after each function implementation passes tests
   263→

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

file.content:
# Tasks: Phase 14B - Numeric Type Predicates Enhancement

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-numeric-predicates/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md (required), spec.md (required), research.md, data-model.md, quickstart.md
**Branch**: `001-numeric-predicates`

**Scope Note**: User Stories 1 & 2 (sign/parity predicates) are **already implemented** in `func-section.lisp:4414-4603`. This task list covers only the remaining 10 functions from User Stories 3, 4, and 5.

**Tests**: TDD required per Constitution VII. Tests written first, must fail before implementation.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story (US3, US4, US5) - maps to spec.md

---

## Phase 1: Setup

**Purpose**: Verify development environment and existing dependencies

- [x] T001 Verify nix develop environment loads with SBCL 2.4+ and wasm-tools
- [x] T002 Verify existing bit operations (ash, logand, logior, logxor) compile correctly

**Checkpoint**: Development environment ready

---

## Phase 2: Foundational (Shared Test Infrastructure)

**Purpose**: Create test file structure that all user stories will use

**⚠️ CRITICAL**: No implementation can begin until test infrastructure exists

- [x] T003 Create test file tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp with rove test package setup
- [x] T004 [P] Create test file tests/contract/byte-ops-wasm-test.lisp for Wasm output validation
- [x] T005 [P] Create helper function `compile-and-validate` in test utils for Wasm validation

**Checkpoint**: Test infrastructure ready - TDD can now proceed

---

## Phase 3: User Story 3 - Bit Testing Functions (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Implement [logbitp](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_logbtp.htm) and [logtest](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_logtes.htm) for testing individual bits

**Independent Test**: Compile `(logbitp 0 5)` and verify it returns T; compile `(logtest 4 3)` and verify it returns NIL

### Tests for User Story 3 (TDD - write first, must fail)

- [x] T006 [P] [US3] Write unit test for logbitp in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T007 [P] [US3] Write unit test for logtest in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T008 [US3] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)

### Implementation for User Story 3

- [x] T009 [US3] Add `logbitp` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T010 [US3] Implement `compile-logbitp` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
- [x] T011 [US3] Add `logtest` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T012 [US3] Implement `compile-logtest` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
- [x] T013 [US3] Run tests and verify they PASS
- [x] T014 [US3] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`

**Checkpoint**: Bit testing functions complete and independently testable

---

## Phase 4: User Story 4 - Byte Specifier Functions (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Implement [byte](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm), [byte-size](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm), [byte-position](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_by_by.htm) using fixnum encoding

**Independent Test**: Compile `(byte-size (byte 8 4))` and verify it returns 8; compile `(byte-position (byte 8 4))` and verify it returns 4

### Tests for User Story 4 (TDD - write first, must fail)

- [x] T015 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte constructor in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T016 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte-size in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T017 [P] [US4] Write unit test for byte-position in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T018 [US4] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)

### Implementation for User Story 4

- [x] T019 [US4] Add `byte` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T020 [US4] Implement `compile-byte` using encoding `(size << 6) | position` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
- [x] T021 [P] [US4] Add `byte-size` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T022 [P] [US4] Implement `compile-byte-size` using `spec >> 6` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
- [x] T023 [P] [US4] Add `byte-position` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T024 [P] [US4] Implement `compile-byte-position` using `spec & 63` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp
- [x] T025 [US4] Run tests and verify they PASS
- [x] T026 [US4] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`

**Checkpoint**: Byte specifier functions complete and independently testable

---

## Phase 5: User Story 5 - Byte Extraction and Manipulation (Priority: P3)

**Goal**: Implement [ldb](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_ldb.htm), [dpb](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_dpb.htm), [mask-field](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_mask_f.htm), [deposit-field](resources/HyperSpec/Body/f_deposi.htm)

**Depends on**: User Story 4 (byte specifier functions)

**Independent Test**: Compile `(ldb (byte 4 4) #xAB)` and verify it returns #xA; compile `(dpb #xC (byte 4 4) #xAB)` and verify it returns #xCB

### Tests for User Story 5 (TDD - write first, must fail)

- [x] T027 [P] [US5] Write unit test for ldb in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T028 [P] [US5] Write unit test for dpb in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T029 [P] [US5] Write unit test for mask-field in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T030 [P] [US5] Write unit test for deposit-field in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp
- [x] T031 [US5] Run tests and verify they FAIL (functions not yet implemented)

### Implementation for User Story 5

- [x] T032 [US5] Add `ldb` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T033 [US5] Implement `compile-ldb` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer >> position) & mask`)
- [x] T034 [US5] Add `mask-field` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T035 [US5] Implement `compile-mask-field` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `integer & field-mask`)
- [x] T036 [US5] Add `dpb` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T037 [US5] Implement `compile-dpb` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer & ~mask) | ((newbyte << pos) & mask)`)
- [x] T038 [US5] Add `deposit-field` dispatch case to func-section.lisp ~line 920
- [x] T039 [US5] Implement `compile-deposit-field` in src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp (formula: `(integer & ~mask) | (newbyte & mask)`)
- [x] T040 [US5] Run tests and verify they PASS
- [x] T041 [US5] Validate generated Wasm with `wasm-tools validate`

**Checkpoint**: All byte operations complete and independently testable

---

## Phase 6: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns

**Purpose**: Registration, documentation, and final validation

- [x] T042 [P] Update feature-registry.lisp with entries for all 10 functions in src/clysm/validation/feature-registry.lisp
- [x] T043 [P] Add HyperSpec links as comments in each compile-* function
- [ ] T044 [P] Create integration test in tests/integration/byte-ops-run-test.lisp
- [ ] T045 Run full test suite: `sbcl --eval "(asdf:test-system :clysm)"`
- [x] T046 Verify quickstart.md checklist is complete

---

## Dependencies & Execution Order

### Phase Dependencies

```
Phase 1 (Setup) → Phase 2 (Foundational) → Phase 3-5 (User Stories) → Phase 6 (Polish)
```

### User Story Dependencies

- **US3 (Bit Testing)**: No dependencies on other stories - can start after Phase 2
- **US4 (Byte Specifiers)**: No dependencies on other stories - can start after Phase 2
- **US5 (Byte Operations)**: Depends on US4 completion (needs byte, byte-size, byte-position)

```
Phase 2 (Foundational)
    │
    ├──→ US3 (Bit Testing) ──→ Phase 6
    │
    ├──→ US4 (Byte Specifiers) ──→ US5 (Byte Operations) ──→ Phase 6
```

### Within Each User Story (TDD)

1. Write tests FIRST (T006-T008, T015-T018, T027-T031)
2. Run tests → MUST FAIL
3. Implement functions (T009-T014, T019-T026, T032-T041)
4. Run tests → MUST PASS
5. Validate Wasm output

### Parallel Opportunities

**Phase 2 (can run in parallel)**:
```
T004 (contract test file) || T005 (test helper)
```

**US3 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
```
T006 (logbitp test) || T007 (logtest test)
```

**US4 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
```
T015 (byte test) || T016 (byte-size test) || T017 (byte-position test)
```

**US4 Implementation (can run in parallel after T020)**:
```
T021+T022 (byte-size) || T023+T024 (byte-position)
```

**US5 Tests (can run in parallel)**:
```
T027 (ldb) || T028 (dpb) || T029 (mask-field) || T030 (deposit-field)
```

**Phase 6 (can run in parallel)**:
```
T042 (registry) || T043 (comments) || T044 (integration test)
```

---

## Parallel Example: User Story 4

```bash
# Launch all tests in parallel (TDD step 1):
Task: "Write unit test for byte constructor in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"
Task: "Write unit test for byte-size in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"
Task: "Write unit test for byte-position in tests/unit/numeric-predicates-test.lisp"

# After byte implemented, launch accessors in parallel:
Task: "Implement compile-byte-size using spec >> 6"
Task: "Implement compile-byte-position using spec & 63"
```

---

## Implementation Strategy

### MVP First (User Story 3 + 4 Only)

1. Complete Phase 1: Setup
2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational
3. Complete Phase 3: US3 (Bit Testing) - `logbitp`, `logtest`
4. Complete Phase 4: US4 (Byte Specifiers) - `byte`, `byte-size`, `byte-position`
5. **STOP and VALIDATE**: 5 functions working independently
6. Can ship MVP with bit testing + byte specifiers

### Full Delivery

1. MVP + Phase 5: US5 (Byte Operations)
2. Phase 6: Polish
3. All 10 functions complete

### Suggested Order

```
T001 → T002 → T003 → T004 → T005 (Setup + Foundational)
                ↓
    ┌───────────┴───────────┐
    ↓                       ↓
US3 (T006-T014)      US4 (T015-T026)
    │                       │
    │                       ↓
    │               US5 (T027-T041)
    │                       │
    └───────────┬───────────┘
                ↓
        Phase 6 (T042-T046)
```

---

## Notes

- All 10 functions go into single file: `src/clysm/compiler/codegen/func-section.lisp`
- Follow existing patterns from `compile-evenp` (line 4576) and `compile-ash` (line 2837)
